text: Dendrophryniscus is a genus of true toads. They live in the forests of Brazil, amazonian Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, and the Guianas. They prefer to live in subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. ==Species== Binomial Name and Author Common Name Dendrophryniscus berthalutzae Dendrophryniscus bokermanni Dendrophryniscus brevipollicatus Coastal Tree Toad Dendrophryniscus carvalhoi Dendrophryniscus leucomystax Lowland Tree Toad Dendrophryniscus minutus Amazonian Tiny Tree Toad Dendrophryniscus stawiarskyi ==Other websites== * . 2007.
